name: 林榮禾
objective: 本課程以哈佛個案教學方法進行，在每個個案討論當中，同時由行銷管理、財務管理、科技管理、生產管理領域老師教授。可以讓學生在學管理工功能之外，還可以學習這些管理功能的整合，學期末並有分組個案競賽，促進團隊互動與學習。

objective:

The Integrated Management Case Studies would be taught by case methods from Havard Business School’s cases. Every case will be taught from Marketing, Financing, Technology Management, and Operation Management areas faculty. This course focus on the integration of management functions. The case contest will be hold on the final week to encourage team building and learning.
